entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
